description.p1: Passionate about machine learning and artificial intelligence, I am always looking for new ways to leverage data to solve real-world problems.
description.p2: Through my academic and personal projects, I have developed strong skills in Python, TensorFlow, and SQL, as well as a deep understanding of machine learning algorithms.
description.p3: I am enthusiastic about collaborating on innovative projects that push the boundaries of technology and bring real added value.

items.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science: Data Administration and Management
items.description: Advanced learning of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning techniques

items.degree: Technical Degree in Computer Science: Data Administration and Management
items.description: Advanced learning of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning techniques

items.degree: High School Diploma - Mathematics and Computer Science
items.institution: Jean Baptiste De Baudre High School
items.description: Programming basics and web development. First team projects.

items.title: Blindio
items.description: Design and development of a randomly generated blind test application. Blindio is an application that allows you to customize your blind tests according to a set of parameters and easily modifiable through the YouTube API.

items.title: MNIST Digit Recognizer
items.description: The goal of this project was to introduce myself to machine learning via TensorFlow by using neural networks to recognize handwritten digits from the famous MNIST dataset. I was also able to create my own algorithm using only NumPy.

items.title: Snake Game AI
items.description: After exploring the basics of machine learning with the MNIST project, I decided to push my skills further by developing an AI capable of playing the Snake game. Using Deep Reinforcement Learning techniques, I trained a model to maximize its score by learning to navigate the game environment.
